mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Project(name,identify,orderno, uid, shared, updateTime) values(#{name},#{identify},#{orderno}, #{uid}, #{shared}, STRFTIME('%s', 'now')*1000 + SUBSTR(STRFTIME('%f', 'now'), 4))
mapper.update: UPDATE Project set name=#{name},identify=#{identify}, uid=#{uid}, shared=#{shared}, updateTime=(STRFTIME('%s', 'now')*1000 + SUBSTR(STRFTIME('%f', 'now'), 4)) where id=#{id}
UPDATE Project set identify=#{identify}, updateTime=(STRFTIME('%s', 'now')*1000 + SUBSTR(STRFTIME('%f', 'now'), 4)) where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.name AS author FROM Project a LEFT JOIN User b ON a.uid = b.id WHERE a.enable = 1 and (a.shared=1 OR (a.shared=0 AND a.uid=#{0})) ORDER BY a.orderno ASC
